title: Sex Slave to the Hydra Futas
description: Luana is a tenacious, documentary filmmaker who has her heart set on finding the elusive Hidden Snake Tribe in the Amazon and winning an Emmy. When she and her team venture into the jungle's dark depths, she ends up getting a scoop far more terrifying, fantastical, and sexually intoxicating than she could have ever believed.  ***WARNING*** THIS STORY HAS EXPLICIT, HARDCORE LESBIAN/FUTA SEX. Those looking for a tame romance erotica should avoid buying my book.  ***All characters in this book are of adult, consenting age. There is no snuff, underage, or non-consenting sex in this book.***  Other books by Tallia Ravejoy: RIDDEN BY THE GRIFFIN PRINCE HOOKED BY THE MERMAN SEX WITH MEDUSA FILLED BY THE HEADLESS HORSEMAN TASTED BY THE POLAR BEAR WARRIORS GIVEN TO THE DRAGON PRINCE HUNTED BY THE STAG KING
author: Tallia Ravejoy
